name: UniRouter
description: UniRouter is a yield-unifying Liquid Staking Platform that maximizes the yield and liquidity of staked Bitcoin assets across various networks, including Layer 1 and Layer 2 solutions. It introduces liquid staking derivatives (LSDs) such as uBTC, which allow users to access enhanced yield opportunities while maintaining liquidity for their staked assets. UniRouter integrates staking fees, cross-chain yield aggregation, and gamified SocialFi campaigns to provide a comprehensive and rewarding ecosystem for Bitcoin holders.
